title: 605. No Such Thing As A Shark With A Ponytail
content:
Sara Pascoe joins Dan, James and Andy to discuss fishing spiders, Blade Runners and Hitler's jumpers.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
